the essence of what

739.24.text: as it goes state to state.

740.64.text:

they attached an

745.98.text: if any entity that is helping

753.15.text: that they can't use that money

754.65.text:

That's been public
 policy in North Dakota

759.49.text:
for as long as I have
 been aware of it.

764.76.text:
that I think almost
  bordered on hysteria

766.87.text:
that misunderstood and
   said this was a gag order

769.27.text:
and you're violating people's
 first amendment rights,

774.04.text: That wasn't the case at all.

examined the amendment,

all it said was that
  you could not use

781.11.text:
to tell someone or encourage

that says if you're gonna
   take money from the state,

795.43.text:
meaning as an entity,
 as an organization,

out of the pockets of the

that money cannot be used

is to adopt an

level and the federal level

1230.56.text:
